items.question: What does Jeremy live on?
items.answer: Mark's kindness, mostly. Early episodes show him badgering Jeremy about overdue rent, but then he seems to let it go, later saying in a series 5 episode "You don't pay rent." Jeremy gets his spending money from occaissional brief spells of employment, claiming benefit, handouts from his mother and sometimes he comes into little bits of money through luck (though often there's a catch).

items.question: Do Mitchell and Webb write "Peep Show"?
items.answer: No, the episodes are written by and Jesse Armstrong. Mitchell and Webb do add additional material. Edit

items.question: Will there be any more seasons of Peep Show?
items.answer: Season 9, currently airing, has been announced as the last season of the show.
